sentences.en: "Basic Instinct" catapulted her to top status among Hollywood's glamour goddesses.
sentences.cn: 《本能》使她跃至一线，成功跻身好莱坞耀眼的女明星之列。

sentences.en: Arran became increasingly estranged from the mainstream of Hollywood.
sentences.cn: 阿伦变得越来越脱离好莱坞的主流了。

sentences.en: By now Murphy is Hollywood'stop male comedy star.
sentences.cn: 墨菲现在已经是好莱坞的一线男喜剧明星了。

sentences.en: Downtime in Hollywood can cost a lot of money.
sentences.cn: 在好莱坞停工会损失许多钱。

sentences.en: Getting Hollywood's latest films released on laser-disc has also helped.
sentences.cn: 通过激光视盘发行好莱坞最新电影也起到了一定作用。

sentences.en: Hollywood cameramen have good reason to blow their own trumpets.
sentences.cn: 好莱坞的摄影师们有足够的理由可以自我吹嘘。

sentences.en: Hollywood has been talking about economizing on movie budgets.
sentences.cn: 好莱坞一直在讨论紧缩电影预算。

sentences.en: Hollywood soon became rife with rumors.
sentences.cn: 整个好莱坞顿时流言四起。

sentences.en: Hollywood was an uncongenial place to work.
sentences.cn: 好莱坞是个不适宜工作的地方。

sentences.en: Leggy blondes are two a penny in Hollywood.
sentences.cn: 在好莱坞，长腿金发美女遍地都是。

sentences.en: The Ball was attended by the cream of Hollywood society.
sentences.cn: 好莱坞的大牌影星们出席了那个舞会。

sentences.en: The bright lights of Hollywood beckon many.
sentences.cn: 好莱坞的花花世界吸引了很多人。

sentences.en: The formula in Hollywood is simple—money talks.
sentences.cn: 好莱坞的生存规则很简单，就是金钱万能。

sentences.en: The glitterati of Hollywood are flocking to Janet Vaughan's nail salon.
sentences.cn: 众多的好莱坞名流都去光顾珍妮特·沃恩的美甲店。

sentences.en: This movie made him the most bankable star in Hollywood.
sentences.cn: 这部电影让他一举成为好莱坞最具票房号召力的明星。

trans.tran_en: You use Hollywood to refer to the film industry that is based in Hollywood, California
